definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: ) (NH Hiph. id.; Pf. 3 pl. [[הכו]] SI:4, Inf. [[[ת]]][[להכ]] ib. 2; Syr. nko0, laesit, nocuit, repugnavit; Aph. laesit, vulneravit; Eth. nakaya: laesit, nocuit; cf. Ar. nakay be defeated, nika0yah;un the inflicting of injury on an enemy Lane:3038);—†

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְנִכָּה וׇמֵת]] consec. 2Sa 11:15 and he shall be smitten [struck by weapon in battle] and die.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[נֻכָָּתָה]] Ex 9:31; 3 pl. [[נֻכּוּ]] v:Ex 9:32 (J), both be smitten down by the hail.

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: lit., smite (with a single, non-fatal, blow), strike, sq. acc., ass Nu 22:23, Nu 22:25, Nu 22:27 ([[בְּמַקֵּל]]), v:Nu 22:28, v:Nu 22:32 (all J); man Ex 21:15, Ex 21:19 (E); cheeks Job 16:10; man (on) cheek (2 acc.) La 3:30, Ps 3:8; man [[עַל־לְחִי]] Mic 4:l4 ([[ב]] instr.), 1Ki 22:24 = 2Ch 18:23; eye Ex 21:26 (E); [[שֵׁבֶט מַכֵּח]] Is 14:29 (fig. of conqueror); with ([[ב]]) stone or fist Ex 21:18 (E), cf. (fig.) Is 58:4 (abs.); smite lion or bear 1Sa 17:35; strike river (with rod [[מַטֶּה]]) 1Sa 7:17 (c. [[עַל]] obj., + [[ב]] instr.), v:1Sa 17:20, Ex 17:5 (E; [[ב]] instr.), also (with mantle) 2Ki 2:8, 2Ki 2:14, 2Ki 2:14, cf. ´[[י]] smiting Euphrates into ([[ל]]) seven streams Is 11:15; dust Ex 8:12, Ex 8:13 (P); rock Ex 17:6 (E), Nu 20:11 (P; [[ב]] instr.), Ps 78:20; fig. smite earth [[בְּשֵׁבֶט פִּיו]] Is 11:4 (of future Davidic kg.); strike on ground ([[אַ֫רְחָה]]; with arrows) 2Ki 13:18, also (abs.) v:2Ki 13:18, v:2Ki 13:19; strike weapons out of ([[מִן]]) hands, Ez Eze 39:3 (´[[י]]; fig. of making powerless); lintel of door Am 9:1; barley-loaf strikes tent Ju Jdg 7:13 (in dream); in fig. of regret, remorse [[וַיַּח לֵב דָּוִד אׂתוֹ]] 2Sa 24:10 and David's heart smote him, so 1Sa 24:6 (+ [[עַל־אֲשֶׁר]] because); of goat smiting (butting with horn) the ram, so as to break its horns Da 8:7 (in vision); smite = hit with missile, sling-stone 1Sa 17:49 (c. acc. pers. + [[אֶל־מִחְחוֹ]]), cf. 2Ki 3:25 (but text perh. corrupt, v. Benz); arrow, 1Ki 22:34 = 2Ch 18:33 (c. acc. pers. + [[בֵּין]]), 2Ki 9:24 (c. id.); of piercing, [[הַכּוֹת]] [[בַּחֲנִית בְּדָוִד וּבַקִּיר]] 1Sa 19:10 smite with the dart into D. and into the wall, pin D. to the wall, [[בַּקִּיר]] ´[[וַיַּח אֶת־הַח]] v:1Sa 19:10, cf. 1Sa 18:11, [[אַכֶּנּוּ בַחֲנִית וּבָאָרֶץ]] 1Sa 26:8.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: smite repeatedly, beat, a man Ex 2:11, Ex 2:13 (E), Ex 5:16 (J), Ne 13:25 ([[מִן]] partit.), cf. De 25:11; here prob. also 1Ki 20:35, 1Ki 20:35, 1Ki 20:37, 1Ki 20:37 ([[הַכֵּה וּפָחׂעַ]] beating and bruising him); of Assyr. under fig. of taskmaster Is 10:24; beat a woman so as to bruise her ([[פָּחַע]]) Ct So 5:7; beat by authority, scourge Je 20:2, Je 37:15, De 25:2, De 25:3 (c. acc. pers. + acc. cogn. [[מַכָּה רַבָּה]]), v:De 25:3 cf. [[כִּן הַכּוֹת]] v:De 25:2 i.e. worthy of scourging, bastinado, (cf. Dr); 2Ch 25:16; Pr 17:10, Pr 19:25, Pr 23:13, Pr 23:14 ([[ב]] instr.); cf. [[גֵּוִי נׇחַתִּי לְמַכִּים]] Is 50:6; of hail, beat down herbage etc. Ex 9:25, Ex 9:25 (cf.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[וַיַּכּוּ כַף]] 2Ki 11:12 and they clapped hands (in applause); elsewhere only Ezek., in mockery; [[כַּף אֶל־כַּף]] Ez Eze 21:19, Eze 21:22; [[בְּכַפְְּ]] Eze 6:11 (‖[[רְקַּע בְּרַגְלְְ]]; acc. [[כַּפִּי]] Eze 22:13.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: give a thrust (with fork) into ([[ב]]) pot 1Sa 2:14; strike roots Ho 14:6 (in fig., but [[וַיֵּלְכוּ]] We Now).

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: rarely smite (in battle) so as (merely) to wound 1Ki 8:28, so (+ acc. cogn. [[מַכָּה]]) v:1Ki 8:29, 1Ki 9:18 = 2Ch 22:6; fig. of ´[[י]]'s wounding Isr. Ho 6:1 (opp. [[חָבַשׁ]] bind up), Je 30:14 (c. acc. cogn.). Cf. smite with ([[ב]]) the tongue Je 18:18.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: smite, of sun, etc., c. acc. pers. Is 49:l0, Ps 121:6; c. [[עַל]] Jon 4:8.
Smite fatally:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: (subj. man) smite, c. acc., + word of killing (dying):—obj. lion and bear 1Sa 17:35; man Ex 21:12, Ex 21:20 (E), Jos 10:26 (JE), Jos 11:17 (D), 1Sa 17:50, 2Sa 1:15, 2Sa 2:31 ([[מִן]] partit. + [[ב]] among), 2Sa 4:7, 2Sa 14:6, 2Sa 18:15, 2Sa 21:17, 1Ki 16:10, 2Ki 12:22, 2Ki 15:30, 2Ki 25:21 = Je 52:27, 2Ki 25:25, Je 41:2, Nu 35:16, Nu 35:17, Nu 35:18, Nu 35:21 (P; all c. [[ב]] instr.); c. acc. + [[אֶל־חׂמֶשׁ]] + [[ב]] instr. 2Sa 2:23 smote him (fatally) in the belly with (on text v. HPS), 2Sa 20:10, cf. 2Sa 3:27, 2Sa 4:6 (but del. LXX Ew Th We Dr Bu HPS); [[וְהִכָּהוּ נֶפֶשׁ]] De 19:11 and he smite him in his life (mortally), and he die, cf. (without word of dying) v:De 19:6, Ge 37:21 (J), Je 40:14, Je 40:15 [otherwise Le 24:17, Le 24:18, Nu 35:11, Nu 35:15, Nu 35:30, De 27:35, Jos 20:3, Jos 20:9]; with prolepsis [[לְהַכּוֹת חֲלָלִים]] smite the slain Ju Jdg 20:31, Jdg 20:39; + [[אַ֫רְחָה]] smite to the ground i.e. kill 2Sa 2:22, 2Sa 18:11.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: smite, of worm gnawing or boring so as to kill plant Jon 4:7.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: very oft. = kill, slay, man or beast (c. 150 t.): Ge 4:15, Ge 8:21 (exterminate; both J), Ex 2:12, Nu 21:35 (E), Jos 7:5 ([[מִן]] partit.), v:Jos 7:5 (JE), De 19:6, De 21:1, De 27:24, De 27:25, Jos 11:10 ([[ב]] instr.; all D), Le 24:17, Le 24:18, Le 24:21, Le 24:21 (H), Nu 35:11, Nu 35:15, Nu 35:21, Nu 35:24, Nu 35:30, Jos 9:18, Jos 20:3, Jos 20:9 (all P), Ju Jdg 15:16, 1Sa 17:9, 1Sa 17:9, 1Sa 17:36, 2Sa 12:9 ([[ב]] instr.), 2Ki 9:7 (exterminate), etc.; c. [[ב]] among 1Sa 23:5, [[מִן]] partit. Ju Jdg 14:19, Jdg 20:45; c. [[ב]] partit. slay at, work slaughter among 2Sa 23:10 (ins. also in ‖ 1Ch 11:13 v. Be:ad loc. Dr:2Sa 23:10), but also [[ב]] of dir. obj. 1Sa 18:7, 1Sa 21:12, 1Sa 29:5; subj. lion 1Ki 20:36, 1Ki 20:36 cf. Je 5:6 (fig. of judgment); ´[[י]] subj. 1Sa 6:19 b ([[ב]] among, + acc. cogn.; 1Sa 6:19 a [[וַיַּךְ]] crpt. v. LXX Th We Dr Kl Kit Bu HPS); slay firstborn Ex 12:2 (J), v:Ex 12:29, Nu 3:13, Nu 8:17, Nu 33:4 (all P), Ps 78:51, Ps 105:36, Ps 135:8; God slays for ([[עַל]]) sin 2Sa 6:7 = 1Ch 13:10 ([[עַל־אֲשֶׁר]]); slay [[לְפִי־חֶרֶב]] De 13:16, De 20:13, Jos 11:11, Jos 11:12, Jos 11:14 (all D), Ju Jdg 18:27, Jdg 21:10, 1Sa 22:9, 2Ki 10:25, Je 21:7, Job 1:15, Job 1:17; kill, slay, c. acc. cogn. ([[מַכָּה]]) 1Sa 14:14, 1Ki 20:21 ([[ב]] among), 2Ch 13:17 ([[בָּהֶם]]), 2Ch 25:13 ([[מֵהֶם]]); c. acc. pers. + acc. cogn. Jos 10:20 (JE), Es 9:5, etc.; kill unwittingly, unintentionally [[הִכָּה בִבְלִי דַ֫עַת]] De 19:4, Jos 20:5 (both D).

Smite = attack, attack and destroy a company Ge 32:9, Ge 32:12, Ge 34:30, Jos 8:21, Ju Jdg 8:11, Jdg 9:43, 2Ki 8:21, 2Ch 21:9; attack and capture a city Ju Jdg 1:8, v:Jdg 1:12 = Jos 15:16 (JE), Jos 7:3, Jos 10:4 (JE), 1Sa 30:1, 1Ki 15:20 = 2Ch 16:4, 2Ki 15:16, 2Ki 15:16, 1Ch 20:1, 2Ch 14:13, Je 47:1; tents 1Ch 4:41 2Ch 14:14; = sack a city [[לְפִי־חֶרֶב]] (slaying inhab.), Jos 8:24, Jos 19:47 (both JE), Jos 10:28, Jos 10:30, Jos 10:32, Jos 10:35, Jos 10:37 cf. v:Jos 10:39 (all D), Ju Jdg 1:25, Jdg 20:37, 2Sa 15:14; esp. defeat kg. or army (involving oft. overthrow, pursuit and slaughter),—c. 95 t.,—Ge 14:5, Ge 14:15, Ge 14:17, Nu 14:45, Nu 21:24 (JE), Jos 8:12, Jos 10:10 (+ acc. cogn.), v:Jos 10:10 ([[עַד]] loc.), Jos 11:8, Jos 11:8 (all JE), De 1:4, De 2:33, De 3:3, De 4:46, De 7:2, De 29:6, Jos 10:33, Jos 10:40 ([[ועד]]—[[מִן]] loc.), Jos 12:1, Jos 12:6, Jos 12:12, Jos 13:12 (all D); Ju Jdg 1:5, Jdg 1:17, 1Sa 11:11, ([[עד]] temp.), 1Ki 13:17 ([[עַד־כַּלֵּה]]), 2Ki 3:24 + v:2Ki 3:24 (where rd. [[וַיׇּבׂאוּ בוֹא וְהַכּוֹת]] and they went on defeating), Is 10:20, Je 37:10, etc.; ins. [[וַיַּח]] or [[הִכָּה]] in 2Sa 8:13 Th Ke Kit Bu cf. Dr, after LXX; c. [[ב]] obj. 1Sa 14:31, 1Sa 23:2, 1Sa 23:2 ([[ה]] loc.—[[מִן]]); + [[לְפִי חֶרֶב]] Ju Jdg 20:48, etc.; of gods causing defeat 2Ch 28:23; smite land = conquer, subjugate, sts. ravage, Ge 14:7, Jos 10:40 (D), 1Sa 27:9, Je 43:11, Je 46:13, cf. Is 14:6 (acc. cogn.); subj. ´[[י]] Nu 32:4 (P); of ´[[י]] smiting sea [[וְהִכָּה בַיׇּם גַּלִּים]] Zec 10:11 (Bev:JPh. xviii. 35 (1889), 88 prop. [[גבלים]]).
Of God,

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: smite with ([[ב]]) a plague, disease, etc.:—blindness Ge 19:11 (J), 2Ki 6:18, 2Ki 6:18 cf. Zec 12:4, Zec 12:4 (symbol.); of Egyptian plagues Ex 3:20, Ex 9:15 (both J), 1Sa 4:8, without [[ב]] Ex 7:25 (J), Ex 12:13 (P), Ps 136:10 (acc. + [[בִּבְכוֹרֵיהֶם]]); other plagues Nu 14:12 (JE), De 28:22, De 28:27, De 28:28, De 28:35, 1Sa 5:6, 2Sa 24:17, Job 2:7, Am 4:9, Hag 2:17, Mal 3:24; without [[ב]], 1Sa 5:9 2Ki 19:35 = Is 37:26; Nu 11:33 (JE ; [[בָּעָם]] + acc. cogn.); smite vines with ([[ב]]) blight Ps 105:33.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: smite = chastise, or send judgment upon, usu. c. acc., 1Ki 14:15, 1Ch 21:7, Is 5:25, Is 9:12, Is 27:7 ([[הַכְּמַכַּת מַכֵּהוּ הִכָּהוּ]]), Is 30:31 ([[ב]] instr.) Is 57:17, Is 60:10 (opp. [[רִחַם]]) Je 2:30, Je 5:3, Je 14:9, Ez Eze 32:15 (LXX Co [[זֵרָה]] scatter); c. [[עִל]] punish for, (sin) Le 26:24 (H).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of God's destroying palaces Am 3:15, Am 6:11 (2 acc.), cf. Zec 9:4.
= receive a blow Is 1:5 (Judah under fig. of man).
be wounded Zec 13:6.
be beaten Ex 5:14, Ex 5:16 (J).

be (fatally) smitten + vb. of dying Ex 22:1 (E); be killed, slain Nu 25:14, Nu 25:14, Nu 25:15, Nu 25:18 (c. [[עַל]], for), [[מֻכֵּי־חֶרֶב]] Je 18:21 (‖[[הֲרֻגֵי מָָוֶת]]); so also (abs.) prob. 1Sa 4:2 (rd. [[וַיֻּכּוּ]] LXX SyrVer Vulgate Th Dr Klo Kit, for MT [[וַיַּכּוּ]]).
be attacked and captured, of city Ez Eze 33:21, Eze 40:1.
be smitten with disease (by God) 1Sa 5:12; abs., of ´[[י]]'s servant Is 53:4.
be blighted, of plant (in fig.) Ho 9:16 (Ephr.), Ps 102:5 (heart, [[כָּעֵשֶׂב]]; both + [[יׇבַשׁ]]).
